001package com.github.siroshun09.configapi.common;
002
003import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
004
005import java.nio.file.Path;
006
007/**
008 * An interface that extends {@link Configuration} to get from a file.
009 * <p>
010 * Using null for @NotNull argument will cause a {@link NullPointerException}.
011 */
012public interface FileConfiguration extends Configuration {
013
014    /**
015     * Loads a yaml file.
016     * <p>
017     * If a yaml file is not found, this method will create one.
018     *
019     * @return True if the load is successful or false if it is failure.
020     */
021    boolean load();
022
023    /**
024     * Checks if the file is loaded.
025     *
026     * @return True if the file is loaded or false if it is not loaded.
027     */
028    boolean isLoaded();
029
030    /**
031     * Reload a yaml file.
032     *
033     * @return True if the reload is successful or false if it is failure.
034     * @see FileConfiguration#load()
035     */
036    default boolean reload() {
037        return load();
038    }
039
040    /**
041     * Save to yaml file.
042     * <p>
043     * If a yaml file is not found, this method will create one.
044     *
045     * @return True if the save is successful or false if it is failure.
046     */
047    boolean save();
048
049    /**
050     * Get the path to a yaml file.
051     *
052     * @return The path to a yaml file.
053     */
054    @NotNull
055    Path getPath();
056}
